review: I love the diversity of the civilizations in  Age of Empires 3 compared to the Age of Empires 2, It's definately worth a play. However don't expect many similarities with the previous installments, as they are few and far between.

helpful: 2 of 3 people (67%) found this review helpful
review: Only in early access, this simple yet delightful puzzler is sure to kill some serious time. At first glance, mini-metro seems extremely simple and relatively easy, however dig a little deeper and this game will bend you over the proverbial table. The minimalist design is refreshing and suits the game perfectly. I thoroughly recommend this game.

Undertale is without a doubt, one of the best titles to be released in 2015. From the completely unique story, and masterpiece of a soundtrack, Toby Fox has created a game that should be experienced by everyone. The narrative of Undertale provides a level of emotion unrivalled by any game of the current generation, as well as light-hearted humour that never seems out of place. STAY DETERMINED!
The real Sim City sequel i've been waiting for!
